thread.title: George W Bush's battle with poncho sparks hilarious reaction online
thread.title_full: George W Bush's battle with poncho sparks hilarious reaction online

author: Hatty Collier
title: George W Bush's battle with poncho sparks hilarious reaction online
text:
George W Bush's battle with poncho sparks hilarious reaction online 
The former President was caught in a tangle of plastic at Donald Trump's inauguration Saturday 21 January 2017 16:17 BST Click to followThe Evening Standard Ordeal: Former US President George W Bush was caught struggling with a poncho at Donald Trump's inauguration REUTERS 
Former President George W Bush sparked a hilarious reaction online after he was caught on camera battling with a poncho at Donald Trump’s inauguration. 
The 70-year-old former Republican president scowled as he struggled with the garment in a bid to shield himself from the elements as Mr Trump was sworn in. 
Light rain had begun as Mr Trump began his inaugural speech with spectators in the audience sheltering beneath plastic ponchos and umbrellas. 
But Mr Bush, who was sat behind former president Barack Obama, could not get his plastic poncho to co-operate. 
He appeared to break into a smile when he realised he had been photographed during the ordeal. 
As photos emerged of Mr Bush’s during the inauguration and people began to shared hilarious reactions and screenshots of his face on social media. George W Bush so embarrassed to be seen in Trump's company he hid in a plastic bag #feels #InaugurationDay pic.twitter.com/n5pZkGRg3o — Ophelia Buckleton (@OBuckleton) January 20, 2017 
Ophelia Buckleton said: "George W Bush so embarrassed to be seen in Trump's company he hid in a plastic bag #feels #InaugurationDay." 
Another person wrote: "Republican or Democrat I think we can all relate to George Bush putting on a poncho." Republican or Democrat I think we can all relate to George Bush putting on a poncho pic.twitter.com/Erm0yfiZ2P — Seanny Drama (@SMSullivan3391) January 20, 2017 George Bush trying to figure out a poncho at the inauguration pic.twitter.com/SCxC9IdAyt
